title: Bodies of executive, son found in water tank in Akmeemana
body_lines: The bodies of a planning executive officer of a factory in Akmeemana and his 8-year old son were found in a water tank of the factory.
Police said the officer of a factory in the Bataduwa area in Akmeemana visited the factory over an official matter accompanying his 8-year-old son on Friday.
The officer was inspecting the underground water tanks built to cool the company's machinery and had not returned for a long time.

The employees then searched for the officer and they recovered the body of the boy inside a water tank and the body of the father was found later in the tank and were taken to the Karapitiya Hospital for an autopsy.
